Package puzzle

Class PuzzleState

java.lang.Object
puzzle.PuzzleState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public final class PuzzleState extends Object implements Cloneable
Represent the current State of the puzzle.

      Returns:
      True if the puzzle is solved else False.
